policy_text: Access to the dataset 'MuseumArtifact' is granted only to approved UC4 dataspace participants. Participants must connect using registered connectors listed in the UC4 dataspace registry (e.g., 'https://uc4-dataspace.example.com/connector1'). Connections from unregistered endpoints are automatically denied.
acceptance_reason: Policy clearly defines technical access constraints
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Access is restricted to registered connectors and approved participants, ensuring measurable and enforceable constraints without ambiguity.

policy_text: Access to the dataset 'CulturalHeritageImages2020' is permitted only for users registered as researchers in the DRK Dataspace program.
acceptance_reason: Role and verification mechanism clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Only registered researchers may access the data. Verification is unambiguous and enforceable via ID checks.

policy_text: Access to 'RareBooksCollection' is permitted between June 1, 2025, and December 1, 2026. Users must anonymize the 'name' field in any derived dataset before storage.
acceptance_reason: Temporal and data transformation requirements clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Start/end dates provide enforceable temporal boundaries, and anonymization requirement ensures privacy without ambiguity.

policy_text: The 'OralTraditionsArchive' dataset may be used only for educational purposes. Commercial use is prohibited. Verification is performed on declared purpose at the point of access.
acceptance_reason: Usage purpose explicitly defined and enforceable
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Clear purpose restriction prevents ambiguity, with technical enforcement possible through access logging and purpose declaration.

policy_text: Münzkabinett Museum must pay a fee of 500 euros for digitization of the 'Todestag' artwork. Payment verification is required before access.
acceptance_reason: Financial obligation clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies amount, party, and service. Enforcement is measurable and unambiguous.

policy_text: Selected cultural datasets are available free of charge if used solely for non-commercial marketing purposes to enhance the institution's visibility. Purpose is verified via submitted use declaration.
acceptance_reason: Conditional access tied to verifiable purpose
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Access condition clearly defined and verifiable; the policy is enforceable without ambiguity.

policy_text: Access to 'ArchiveArtifact' datasets is allowed only if the declared purpose corresponds to an ArchiveEvent. Semantic classification of declared purpose is verified using the DRK ontology.
acceptance_reason: Semantic constraint explicitly verifiable
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Access control is based on verifiable semantic class; the policy is specific, measurable, and implementable.

policy_text: Access to the 'UC4 Partner' dataset is allowed only before January 1, 2030, 09:00:01. Dataset usage is restricted to users physically located in Germany, verified via IP geolocation.
acceptance_reason: Temporal and geographic constraints measurable and consistent
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Future date and location restriction are both precise and enforceable, with no contradictions.

policy_text: UC4 partners may view a maximum of 50 images per calendar day from the 'Daten Raumkultur' dataset. Count resets at midnight local time.
acceptance_reason: Numerical usage limit and reset interval clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Quantitative limit is enforceable and measurable; the reset interval avoids ambiguity.

policy_text: Access via the 'Daten Raumkultur Connector' is permitted exclusively for the named UC4 Partner. No additional restrictions apply to the number of connector instances they operate.
acceptance_reason: Exclusive access rights clearly scoped
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Exclusive access to a defined actor is clearly stated and measurable. No ambiguities in connector instance count.

policy_text: The UC4 Partner may use the dataset 'http://w3id.org/drk/ontology/d1234' up to 30 times. Each usage must be logged for audit purposes.
acceptance_reason: Numerical usage limit is clearly defined and enforceable
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies exact count limit and requires logging, making the policy measurable and enforceable without ambiguity.

policy_text: UC4 Partner may access the image dataset 'http://w3id.org/drk/ontology/d1234' solely for training and evaluation. All images must be anonymized before usage to remove identifiable information.
acceptance_reason: Purpose-limited access with clear privacy requirements
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies both purpose and anonymization requirement. Enforcement is measurable and ensures privacy without ambiguity.

policy_text: Subscribers of the 'ShowTimesAPI' at DE_Staatstheater_Augsburg, including 'Culture Research Institute' and 'Cultural Platform Bavaria', may access cultural assets. Access limited to Germany, expires on May 10, 2025.
acceptance_reason: Actors, geography, and expiration clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: All constraints are measurable and enforceable; expiration date is in the future relative to current time.

policy_text: Public access is allowed to digital reproductions of 'Große Düne' by C. D. Friedrich. Museum Münzkabinett may view, download, and share images for non-commercial purposes.
acceptance_reason: Specific asset, actions, and usage limitations clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Access actions and non-commercial limitation are enforceable without ambiguity.

policy_text: DE_Staatstheater_Augsburg provides free access to 'HistoricalArchives' for educational purposes and scientific research. Scholars may explore the dataset without fees.
acceptance_reason: Fee waiver tied to verifiable purpose
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Conditional access is clearly defined with measurable beneficiaries and no ambiguity.

policy_text: Users must register with ORCID or email to access the ArchiveEvent repository at Münzkabinett. Only authenticated users may view or download the dataset.
acceptance_reason: Authentication requirements are clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies credentials and permitted actions. Enforcement is straightforward and unambiguous.

policy_text: Approved data scientists may access MedResearch clinical trial data for secondary analysis after: 1) anonymization, 2) Ethics Committee approval, 3) use on secured servers, 4) pre-publication review 14 days before release. Access duration: 180 days from approval.
acceptance_reason: Comprehensive workflow with measurable requirements
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Each stage has specific, enforceable requirements. No contradictions exist between conditions.

policy_text: Consumer at https://www.example.com/consumer must inform provider at https://www.example.com/provider each time 'File 1' is used.
acceptance_reason: Clear requirement for reporting usage events
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Defines a measurable obligation for transparency, supporting accountability and enforceability.

policy_text: Consumer must delete 'https://www.example.com/data1.csv' before 2027-07-10T00:00:00Z, as specified by provider.
acceptance_reason: Deletion deadline clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Temporal obligation is specific, measurable, and enforceable, ensuring compliance with data minimization principles.

policy_text: Provider must update 'File 1' every 30 seconds to maintain freshness. Update logs must be recorded.
acceptance_reason: Update interval is clearly defined and measurable
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Enforceable and quantifiable, ensuring dataset remains current without contradictions.

policy_text: Provider may distribute 'File 1' only after SHACL validation using shape at http://example.com/shacl-shape. Quality check occurs before usage or sharing.
acceptance_reason: Enforceable quality control step defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: SHACL validation is a measurable precondition, ensuring data integrity and consistency.

policy_text: Consumer must aggregate 100% of 'File 1' when using the dataset. Aggregation logs must be retained.
acceptance_reason: Aggregation obligation clearly quantified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies complete aggregation requirement, measurable and enforceable without ambiguity.

policy_text: Consumer may read up to 1024 MiB of 'File 1'. System logs must track cumulative read size.
acceptance_reason: Numerical limit on read operations clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Enforceable via monitoring read operations; limit is precise and measurable.

policy_text: Consumer may read 'File 1' at a maximum bandwidth of 20 MBit/s. Bandwidth usage is monitored per session.
acceptance_reason: Bandwidth limit measurable and enforceable
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Quantitative limit on data transfer ensures fair usage; monitoring allows enforcement without ambiguity.

policy_text: Consumer may maintain up to 5 concurrent active connections to 'File 1'. Connections beyond limit are rejected automatically.
acceptance_reason: Concurrent connection limit clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Max connections enforceable technically; policy is precise and measurable.

policy_text: Access to 'File 1' is permitted only to members of the 'Mobility Dataspace'. Provider is https://www.example.com/provider.
acceptance_reason: Membership requirement clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Membership verification allows enforceable access control with no ambiguity.

policy_text: Access to selected datasets may require sequential conditions: 1) fee payment, 2) authentication, 3) purpose declaration. Each step must be verified before granting access.
acceptance_reason: Sequential, enforceable conditions clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Each condition is measurable, sequential, and enforceable without contradictions, ensuring practical implementation.

policy_text: Access to datasets such as 'ImageArtwork', 'PhysicalArtwork', and 'ArchiveEvent' is permitted only to approved researchers affiliated with recognized institutions or registered dataspace participants. All other users are denied access.
acceptance_reason: Policy clearly defines access based on specific roles or membership
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy establishes clear role-based constraints, specifying the permitted users (approved researchers, university members, dataspace participants) and denying all others. The constraint is measurable and enforceable, making it a realistic and implementable access control rule within the DRK dataspace framework.

policy_text: All data consumers accessing 'ArchiveEvent' datasets must log every read or download action and notify the provider within 24 hours of access.
acceptance_reason: Policy enforces accountability and transparency for data usage
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy establishes a measurable obligation for logging and reporting all dataset access events. The 24-hour notification requirement is precise and enforceable, ensuring transparent use without ambiguity.

policy_text: The data consumer must permanently delete the dataset 'SensitiveCulturalData' by 2026-12-31T23:59:59Z after project completion, as mandated by the provider.
acceptance_reason: Policy defines a clear temporal data retention limit
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy specifies a precise deletion deadline to comply with data minimization principles. The constraint is unambiguous and technically feasible, aligning with standard ethical and legal requirements.

policy_text: When using the dataset 'MuseumRecords', the consumer is required to aggregate all records for statistical analysis and reporting purposes.
acceptance_reason: Policy sets a clear, measurable obligation for aggregation
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy defines a specific and enforceable duty to aggregate the dataset completely. The requirement is quantifiable, supporting consistent data analysis and preventing partial usage that could lead to misinterpretation.

policy_text: Access to the dataset 'HighResImages' is limited to a maximum of 3 concurrent connections per consumer to avoid server overload.
acceptance_reason: Policy defines a precise limit on simultaneous connections
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy establishes a measurable constraint on concurrent usage, ensuring technical stability and enforceability. The limit is clear and implementable without ambiguity.

policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionImages' may only be accessed between 2025-06-01 and 2025-12-31. Access outside this window is strictly prohibited.
acceptance_reason: Policy clearly specifies access time window
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy defines precise temporal constraints for dataset access. The start and end dates are explicit and enforceable, ensuring the policy can be implemented without ambiguity or contradiction.

policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_CulturalImages' is assigned by the dataset creator (assigner) and may be used by all registered DRK dataspace participants (assignees). The dataset is licensed under CC-BY 4.0: users may share and adapt the data for any purpose, provided proper attribution is given to the assigner. No restrictions apply beyond attribution.
acceptance_reason: Policy provides clear CC-BY 4.0 licensing terms with assigner and assignee clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy represents the standard CC-BY 4.0 license in a cultural data space context. Permissions include sharing and derivative works; duty requires attribution to the assigner; no prohibitions. Assigners and assignees are explicitly stated for clarity and enforcement.

policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_HeritageDocuments' is assigned by the dataset creator (assigner) and may be accessed by all verified DRK dataspace participants (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-NC 4.0, users may share and adapt the dataset for non-commercial purposes only, and attribution to the assigner is mandatory. Commercial use is prohibited.
acceptance_reason: Policy provides clear non-commercial licensing terms with assigner and assignee explicitly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces CC-BY-NC 4.0 licensing: sharing and derivative works allowed for non-commercial purposes; duty requires attribution; commercial use is prohibited. Assigner and assignee roles are clearly specified for policy enforcement and automated reasoning.

policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_AncientMaps' is assigned by the providing institution (assigner) and may be used by registered DRK dataspace participants (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-NC-ND 4.0, users may share the dataset non-commercially, must provide attribution to the assigner, and are strictly prohibited from creating derivative works.
acceptance_reason: Policy enforces non-commercial, no-derivative licensing with assigner and assignee clearly stated
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy represents CC-BY-NC-ND 4.0: sharing allowed non-commercially, attribution required, derivatives prohibited. Roles of assigner and assignee are explicitly mentioned for clarity and implementability.

policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_MuseumAudio' is assigned by the data provider (assigner) and accessible to all verified DRK dataspace participants (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0, users may share and adapt the dataset for non-commercial purposes, must provide attribution to the assigner, and any derivative work must carry the same license as the original. Commercial use is prohibited.
acceptance_reason: Policy clearly defines non-commercial, share-alike licensing with explicit assigner and assignee
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0: permissions allow sharing and derivatives for non-commercial purposes; duties include attribution and ShareAlike; commercial use prohibited. Assigner and assignee roles are explicitly included.

policy_text: The dataset 'DRK_HistoricalPhotographs' is assigned by the dataset creator (assigner) and may be used by all registered participants of the DRK dataspace (assignees). Licensed under CC-BY-SA 4.0, users may share and adapt the dataset for any purpose, provided proper attribution is given to the assigner, and any derivative work must use the same license as the original.
acceptance_reason: Policy enforces full sharing and derivative permissions with attribution and share-alike, with assigner and assignee clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy represents CC-BY-SA 4.0: sharing and derivatives allowed for any purpose; duty requires attribution and ShareAlike; no prohibitions beyond those. Assigner and assignee are clearly mentioned to support automated reasoning and compliance checks.

policy_text: The dataset 'HistoricPhotos2024' may be shared and adapted for any purpose by 'CulturalDataConsumer' as assigned by 'NationalArchives'. Attribution must always be given to 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Clear CC-BY 4.0 licensing with assigner and assignee specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy provides full sharing and derivative permissions under CC-BY 4.0, specifying both the assigner and the assignee for explicit rights enforcement.

policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumArtifacts' may be shared or adapted non-commercially by 'UniversityResearchLab' with attribution to 'CityMuseum'. Commercial use is prohibited.
acceptance_reason: Non-commercial licensing clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces CC-BY-NC 4.0 with explicit assigner and assignee, enabling automated validation of non-commercial constraints.

policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionImages' may only be accessed by 'GalleryPartner' between 2025-06-01 and 2025-12-31. Access outside this window is prohibited.
acceptance_reason: Policy specifies clear access time window with assignee
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces a strict temporal constraint and defines the assignee for automated access control.

policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalEventsData' may be accessed by 'EventResearchTeam' up to 5 times as assigned by 'CityCulturalOffice'. Further access requests are denied.
acceptance_reason: Maximum number of usages clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This N-times usage policy ensures automated enforcement of access counts for the designated assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'HistoricMaps' may be used by 'GeographyDept' for a duration of 10 hours after download, as assigned by 'NationalLibrary'.
acceptance_reason: Usage duration clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Duration-based access allows automated enforcement of data use for a defined period for the specified assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionCatalog' may be used by 'ExhibitionTeam' from 2025-05-01 to 2025-10-31. After this period, the dataset must be deleted as assigned by 'MuseumAdmin'.
acceptance_reason: Policy specifies access interval and post-duty deletion
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Combines temporal constraints with a post-duty DELETE action, explicitly assigning rights to the assignee.

policy_text: Access to the dataset 'CulturalHeritageAudio' by 'AudioResearchTeam' must be logged to the clearing house as assigned by 'CityArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Logging requirements clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces usage logging for accountability, specifying both assigner and assignee.

policy_text: When 'DigitalArtTeam' accesses the dataset 'DigitalArtCollection', a notification must be sent to 'https://culturaldata.gov/log' as assigned by 'NationalGallery'.
acceptance_reason: Notification URL specified with assigner and assignee
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Automated notifications allow real-time monitoring of dataset access for the specified assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'ArchivalPhotos' may only be accessed via the connector 'https://partner-connector.govdata.de' by 'ArchiveResearcher', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Policy restricts access to specific connector
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Connector-restricted usage ensures the data is only accessible through an authorized endpoint for the specified assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'SensitiveCulturalData' may only be accessed by 'CulturalSecurityTeam' if the connector uses 'TRUST_SECURITY_PROFILE', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Security level restriction clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces connector security requirements for access by the designated assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumInventory' may only be used by users with the role 'Curator' as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.
acceptance_reason: Role-based access clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Restricting dataset usage to a specific role ensures proper data governance within cultural institutions.

policy_text: The dataset 'RegionalArtifacts' may only be accessed within Germany by 'RegionalResearchGroup', as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.
acceptance_reason: Location-based access clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces geographic constraints to comply with national data sharing regulations.

policy_text: The dataset 'EthnographicInterviews' may only be used for academic research purposes by 'UniversityAnthropologyDept', as assigned by 'CulturalDataCenter'.
acceptance_reason: Purpose-based access clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Purpose restriction ensures dataset is used only for the intended research objectives by the designated assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'ExhibitionCatalog2025' may only be accessed by 'ExhibitionTeam' during the event dates 2025-08-01 to 2025-08-31, as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.
acceptance_reason: Event-based access window clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: This policy enforces temporal access tied to a specific event for the designated assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalStatistics2025' may be accessed by 'StatsResearchTeam' under a monthly rental agreement, as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.
acceptance_reason: Periodic payment and access rights clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Data rental ensures continued access under financial and temporal constraints, assigned to a specific assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'OpenCulturalData' may be freely accessed by 'AllRegisteredUsers' as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Unrestricted access clearly granted
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Simple permission granting access without restrictions, with assigner and assignee specified.

policy_text: The dataset 'ArchivalPhotos' may only be accessed via the connector 'https://partner-connector.govdata.de' by 'ArchiveResearcher', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Access restricted to a specific connector
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Restricts dataset access to a defined connector for a specific assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumArtifacts3D' may only be used within the application 'VirtualMuseumViewer' by 'MuseumTechTeam', as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.
acceptance_reason: Access restricted to specific application
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Ensures dataset is used only within the authorized application by the designated assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionImages' may only be accessed by 'GalleryPartner' between 2025-06-01 and 2025-12-31. Access outside this interval is prohibited, as assigned by 'MuseumAdmin'.
acceptance_reason: Time interval clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Defines explicit temporal window for access by the assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'HistoricMaps' may be used by 'GeographyDept' for 10 hours after download, as assigned by 'NationalLibrary'.
acceptance_reason: Duration of usage clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Limits access duration from the start time for the designated assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'RegionalArtifacts' may only be accessed within Germany by 'RegionalResearchGroup', as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.
acceptance_reason: Geographic restriction clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Restricts access based on the assignee's physical location.

policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalStatistics2024' may be purchased once by 'StatsResearchTeam' for perpetual use, as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.
acceptance_reason: One-time purchase granting perpetual access
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies financial and access rights for assignee under a one-time sale.

policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalStatistics2025' may be accessed by 'StatsResearchTeam' under a monthly rental agreement, as assigned by 'FederalCulturalOffice'.
acceptance_reason: Periodic access under rental agreement
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Defines usage rights over a specified rental period for the designated assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'MuseumInventory' may only be used by users with the role 'Curator', as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.
acceptance_reason: Role-based access clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Access limited to specific roles ensures governance of sensitive cultural data.

policy_text: The dataset 'EthnographicInterviews' may only be used for academic research by 'UniversityAnthropologyDept', as assigned by 'CulturalDataCenter'.
acceptance_reason: Purpose-based access clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Restricts usage to the stated purpose for the assigned assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'ExhibitionCatalog2025' may only be accessed by 'ExhibitionTeam' during the event dates 2025-08-01 to 2025-08-31, as assigned by 'CityMuseum'.
acceptance_reason: Event-based access window clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Enforces temporal access tied to a specific event for the assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalEventsData' may be accessed up to 5 times by 'EventResearchTeam', as assigned by 'CityCulturalOffice'.
acceptance_reason: Maximum number of usages clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Limits access count for automated enforcement of usage policy.

policy_text: The dataset 'SensitiveCulturalData' may only be accessed by 'CulturalSecurityTeam' if the connector uses 'BASE_SECURITY_PROFILE', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Security level restriction clearly defined
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Enforces connector security requirements for the assignee.

policy_text: The dataset 'TemporaryExhibitionCatalog' may be used by 'ExhibitionTeam' from 2025-05-01 to 2025-10-31. After this period, it must be deleted as assigned by 'MuseumAdmin'.
acceptance_reason: Temporal access with post-duty deletion
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Enforces temporal usage followed by automated deletion for the assigned assignee.

policy_text: The dataset '3DScanData' may only be modified during transmission by 'DataProcessingTeam', as assigned by 'MuseumTechAdmin'.
acceptance_reason: Modification allowed only in transit
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies the condition under which data may be altered, with assigner and assignee clear.

policy_text: The dataset 'CulturalRecordsDB' may only be modified at rest by 'DatabaseAdmin', as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Modification allowed only at rest
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Specifies conditions for modifying stored data with clear assigner and assignee.

policy_text: Usage of the dataset 'CulturalHeritageAudio' by 'AudioResearchTeam' must be logged locally and sent to the clearing house, as assigned by 'CityArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Logging requirements clearly specified
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Enforces usage logging for accountability, with assigner and assignee specified.

policy_text: When 'DigitalArtTeam' accesses the dataset 'DigitalArtCollection', a notification must be sent to 'https://culturaldata.gov/log', as assigned by 'NationalGallery'.
acceptance_reason: Notification URL specified with assigner and assignee
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Automated notifications enable real-time monitoring for the assigned assignee.

policy_text: Access to the dataset 'RestrictedArchiveDocs' is prohibited for all users, as assigned by 'NationalArchives'.
acceptance_reason: Access explicitly denied
acceptance_reasoning_detailed: Prevents access completely, clearly specifying assigner.
